name: RD2_ACHIEVEMENT_05
description: Mutants - Attack a unit outside the Red Death while inside the Red Death 20 times.

name: RD2_ACHIEVEMENT_06
description: Pirates - Spend 50 turns in the water across multiple games.

name: RD2_ACHIEVEMENT_07
description: Borderlords - Trick enemy factions into triggering Grieving Gifts 5 times across multiple games.

name: RD2_ACHIEVEMENT_08
description: Cultists - Kill 10 units with the Undying Eye.

name: RD2_ACHIEVEMENT_09
description: Jocks - Use Hail Marys to wound, but not kill, 5 Civilians across multiple games.

name: RD2_ACHIEVEMENT_10
displayName: They're coming to get you, Barbara
description: Zombie Beastmasters - Spawn 30 Zombie Hordes through combat kills.

name: RD2_ACHIEVEMENT_11
displayName: Out of Sight, Out of Mind
description: Aliens - Attack while cloaked 20 times.

name: STK2_ACHIEVEMENT_01
description: Win a regular game as Menelik II.

name: STK2_ACHIEVEMENT_02
description: Defeat an Infantry unit whose capital is on another continent with an Oromo Cavalry.

description: Earn all Governor promotions for the Hermetic Order Secret Society.

name: STK2_ACHIEVEMENT_05

name: STK2_ACHIEVEMENT_06
description: Earn all Governor promotions for the Sanguine Pact Secret Society.

description: Win a regular game as Basil II.

name: STK3_ACHIEVEMENT_02
description: Win a regular game as Ambiorix.

name: STK3_ACHIEVEMENT_03
displayName: Rome is Where the Heart is
description: As Byzantium, take the original capital of Rome while it is following your founded religion.

name: STK3_ACHIEVEMENT_04
description: As Gaul, kill a Tank with a Gaesatae.

name: STK3_ACHIEVEMENT_05
description: In Dramatic Ages Mode, lose 4 or more cities by entering a Dark Age.

name: STK3_ACHIEVEMENT_06
description: In Dramatic Ages Mode, enter a Golden Age with an excess 20 Era Score

name: STK3_ACHIEVEMENT_07
description: In Dramatic Age Mode, as Georgia, have simultaneously a Golden and a Dark Policy active.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_01
description: Dread Pirate - Sink 10 ships while using Walk the Plank across multiple games.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_02
description: Privateer - Ensure that your patron has a naval fleet twice the size of any other colonial power.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_03
description: Swashbuckler - Visit the tavern of 10 ports in a single game.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_04
displayName: Love It When a Plan Comes Together
description: Hoarder - Sink or capture a treasure ship while a treasure escort is locked by a chainshot.

description: Win the Pirates scenario.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_06
description: Lose the Pirates scenario due to mutiny.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_07
description: Sink or capture a treasure ship.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_08
description: Win the Pirates scenario using mostly Treasure Points.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_09
displayName: I am Kind of a Big Deal
description: Win the Pirates scenario using mostly Infamous Pirate Points.

name: ARR_ACHIEVEMENT_10
displayName: I Want You to Hit Me as Hard as You Can
description: Win the Pirates scenario using mostly Fightin' Points.

description: Win a regular game as Hammurabi.

name: STK4_ACHIEVEMENT_02
displayName: Let's Do the Time Warp Again
description: As Babylon, earn 5 tech boosts for techs that are at least one era later than your current era.

name: STK4_ACHIEVEMENT_04
description: Kill an enemy Hero with your Hero.

description: Recall a Hero 5 times in a single game.

name: STK4_ACHIEVEMENT_06
description: Recall a Hero after the Industrial Era.

name: STK4_ACHIEVEMENT_07
description: Claim 5 Heroes in a single game.

description: Win a regular game as Bà Triệu.

description: Hire a unique unit from a Barbarian Clan.
